name: Tinker'S Workshop
description: A workshop where small repairs and modifications are made; adventurers can fix broken items, commission custom modifications, or learn about mechanical devices and gadgets.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the metallic scent of tools and the sound of small repairs being made and the rhythmic work of fixing and modifying various items. The air carries the promise of restoration and the essential nature of mechanical expertise, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of problem-solving and the satisfaction of making broken things work again.
